short_summary: One (1) Senior Technician and One (1) Intermediate Technician for technical engineering and maintenance services.
description: The contract will involve the provision of technical engineering and maintenance services. The requirement is for one (1) Senior Technician and one (1) Intermediate Technician. This is a competitive contract for a one (1) year period, with the option to extend for two (2) one-year periods. The contractor will provide technical support and maintenance services for the Canadian Forces.
